snippet: Shinzo Abe, Japan’s presumptive new prime minister, whose earlier term ended in failure in 2007, is in many ways a changed man, shifting his focus from nationalism to the economy.
abstract: Shinzo Abe, Japan's presumptive prime minister, whose earlier term ended in failure in 2007, is shifting his focus from nationalism to economy as he returns to power.
lead_paragraph: Shinzo Abe, Japan’s presumptive new prime minister, whose earlier term ended in failure in 2007, is in many ways a changed man, shifting his focus from nationalism to the economy.

headline.seo: Japan’s Next Leader, Shinzo Abe, Shifts Focus
headline.main: Incoming Leader’s Plan: Not Repeating His Errors
headline.print_headline: Incoming Leader’s Plan: Not Repeating His Errors
